data.title: Awesome place. Don't miss it
data.text:
Can easily miss it and drive by, but don't. Great food here, nice portion and very reasonable prices.

Staff super friendly!

data.title: Not bad
data.text: Decent price and good service.  Food is good as well.  Would loved to have seen some indication on items they are known for on the menu

data.title: Nice, authentic little place
data.text:
Everyone in the family liked what they got: chicken flautas, green vile burritos, a guacamole taco for our granddaughter, tamales, tacos, and huevos ranchero. I got a chile relleno I really liked, with rice and beans and a taco.

My only complaint was they were a little too heavy-handed with the salt.

But the food and prices were decent, quantities generous, and service very friendly. We would definitely return.

data.title: Great Lunch!
data.text: Just a little Adobe building on side of road that packs a super punch! lunch was delis! Hot and quick! I ordered a soft taco and a tamale!!! yum yum!!

data.title: Outstanding Mexican Restaurant
data.text: This is a tiny place with a lot to offer. I had the Chicken Chimi Special and a few margaritas.  Like most places they served chips and salsa before the food came out.  The chips were good and the salsa was great.  I would like to take some of the salsa home. The Chicken Chimi Special came with rice and beans.  The rice was good and the beans were great. The chicken chimi was excellent.  I think there was a tomato and onion mix in with the chicken.  The margaritas were outstanding.  I usually only have one with a meal but had to order a second one.  The service was outstanding.  Everyone was extremely helpful and friendly from the time I entered until the time I left.  My server was extremely attentive. The prices are very reasonable.  This is a small place so I wouldn't get there when they are busy.  This is definitely one of my new favorite Mexican food places.

data.title: Best out here
data.text: The real stuff .. Everything fresh, salsa kept coming.  Mom and Pop .. Love it.  It can get busy so be patient.  I'm telling you .. It's worth a stop!

data.title: A place you shouldn't miss
data.text: Lunch was very good, beef burrito, rice and beans; salsa and chips complimentary. Tony's has fewer than fifteen tables, so there is only a short wait for excellent Mexican food served on really HOT plates. Prices are reasonable, iced tea really has some tea in it. The restaurant is located in old town Avondale.

data.title: Old School
data.text: This place has been here for many years and the food is still really good and I enjoy that it has stayed the same and remained local to Avondale... Thank you Tonys
